title: TFR Ep. 622: Honk For Jesus. Save Your Soul., Resurrection, TFR Libs
description:
This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt share with you a kindness with their discussion of Adamma Ebo’s ‘Honk For Jesus. Save Your Soul’. The dark satire about a mega-church’s fall from grace and attempted comeback featuring Regina Hall and Sterling K. Brown.  Redemption is guaranteed, right? Then Rebecca Hall and Tim Roth star in a riveting thriller,  ‘Resurrection’. A film that takes a turn that may or may not work. Hall has been on quite a streak, does it continue? There’s the transcendent rundown of the big releases on physical media, featuring the Streaming and Straight to DVD Picks of the Week.  Matt and Chris then close the show with another round of everyone’s favorite fill in the blank game, ‘TFR Libs’!  Featuring Indiana Jones, Hellraiser, and more!

00:00-14:52 Intro/Honk for Jesus. Save Your Soul

14:53-28:18 Physical Media, Weekly Picks and Darkplace!

28:19-40:50 Resurrection

40:51-1:02 TFR Libs

1:02-1:04 Wrap-Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey
